ナビゲーション・リンクをスキップ
  • 概要
  • パッケージ
  • クラス
  • 階層ツリー
  • 非推奨
  • 索引
  • ヘルプ
  • 前
  • 次
  • フレーム
  • フレームなし
  • すべてのクラス

すべてのパッケージの階層

パッケージ階層:
  • communication,
  • communication.client,
  • communication.handler,
  • communication.receiver,
  • communication.sender,
  • communication.server

クラス階層

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.receiver.ExtendableReceiver (implements communication.receiver.Receiver)
      • communication.receiver.FileReceiver
    • communication.sender.ExtendableSender (implements communication.sender.Sender)
      • communication.sender.CollectionSender
      • communication.sender.FileSender
    • communication.Header
    • communication.receiver.MultiDataReceiver (implements communication.receiver.Receiver)
    • communication.sender.MultiDataSender (implements communication.sender.Sender)
    • communication.client.NonBlockingClient (implements communication.client.Client, communication.Disconnectable)
    • communication.server.NonBlockingServer (implements communication.Disconnectable, communication.server.Server)
    • communication.OnceSwapper (implements communication.Swapper)
    • communication.handler.ReadingHandler (implements communication.handler.Handler)
    • communication.Remote
    • communication.server.RemoteStarter (implements communication.handler.Handler)
    • communication.RepeatSwapper (implements communication.Swapper)
    • communication.handler.WritingHandler (implements communication.handler.Handler)

インタフェース階層

  • java.lang.AutoCloseable
    • communication.server.Server (同様に extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>)
  • java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    • communication.client.Client
    • communication.server.Server (同様に extends java.lang.AutoCloseable)
  • communication.Disconnectable
  • communication.handler.Handler
  • communication.receiver.OnReceiveListener
  • communication.sender.OnSendListener
  • communication.receiver.Receiver
  • communication.sender.Sender
  • communication.server.Server.OnAcceptListener
  • communication.server.Server.OnShutdownCallback
  • communication.Swapper
  • communication.Swapper.SwapperFactory

列挙型階層

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<E> (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
      • communication.receiver.Receiver.Result
      • communication.sender.Sender.Result
ナビゲーション・リンクをスキップ

  • パッケージ
